subject: Create OpenSpec scaffolding for add-manual-verification-tests
description: Created OpenSpec scaffolding with proposal.md, tasks.md, design.md, and spec delta. Evidence: `openspec/changes/add-manual-verification-tests/proposal.md:1` contains `# Change: Add Manual Verification Tests for Session Re-initialization`. Verified via `openspec validate add-manual-verification-tests --strict` returned "Change 'add-manual-verification-tests' is valid".
